exam.question: This new laser printer is ______ with all leading software.

answer.explain: be compatible with： 与…兼容。句意： 这台新激光打印机与所有主要的软件都兼容。comparable： 可比较的， 比得上的； competitive： 竞争的； cooperative： 合作的， 协力的。

sentences.sContent: The new software is IBM compatible (= can be used with IBM computers ) .
sentences.sCn: 这个新软件与IBM的计算机兼容。

sentences.sContent: ...people have cultures and not all cultures are compatible with the culture in this country that has produced such benefits for the American people for so long...

phrases.pCn: adj. 与……和谐相处；与……相配的

remMethod.val: com ＋ pat(=path， 感情) ＋ ible → 有共同感情的 → 能和睦相处的， 合得来的

words.tran: 适合地；协调地；相互兼容地

trans.tranCn: 兼容的； 能和睦相处的， 合得来的
trans.tranOther: if two pieces of computer equipment are compatible, they can be used together, especially when they are made by different companies
